# container

**Instance Property**

The configuration’s container.

## Declaration

```swift
var container: CKContainer? { get set }
```

## Discussion

If you don’t provide a container, CloudKit uses the default container that [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKContainer] provides.

## Preparing a Configuration

- **allowsCellularAccess**: A Boolean value that indicates whether operations that use this configuration can send data over the cellular network.
- **isLongLived**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the operations that use this configuration are long-lived.
- **qualityOfService**: The priority that the system uses when it allocates resources to the operations that use this configuration.
- **timeoutIntervalForRequest**: The maximum amount of time that a request can take.
- **timeoutIntervalForResource**: The maximum amount of time that a resource request can take.
